short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save, manage, and access your favorite prompts directly in ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Prompt Saver is a FREE tool designed to save and manage your ChatGPT prompts seamlessly right within the ChatGPT interface. Save any prompt with a custom name and description for quick access directly in the chat input field. Easily edit and delete your saved prompts at any time.

Our extension is compatible with both the free and Plus versions of ChatGPT. It does not require an OpenAI API key.

All data is securely stored locally on your Chrome browser, ensuring privacy and security.

Prompt Saver is just the beginningâ€”we're committed to expanding its features and capabilities based on your feedback. It's completely free to use, so install today and transform how you interact with ChatGPT!
